get.summary: Get current state of application.

name.description: The user's display name. It does not need to be unique.

username.description:
The id to display to users. They must be unique, but the users can choose and change them.
### Rules
- Only accepts letters, digits and '.', '-', '_'.

profilePictureId.description: The id to the profile picture of the user. These pictures cannot be uploaded, we store the options manually.

spotifyId.description: The user's id to use to connect with spotify services. It is not stored within the database, but some requests need it to function.

friendUsername.description:
The id to display to users. They must be unique, but the users can choose and change them.

- Only accepts letters, digits and '.', '-', '_'.

get.summary: Get lyrics for a specific track
get.description: This endpoint retrieves the lyrics for a given track using its Musixmatch ID

parameters.name: trackMusixMatchId
parameters.description: Identifier for the track provided by MusixMatch.

lyricsId.description: Identifier for the lyrics provided by MusixMatch.

trackId.description: Identifier for the track associated with these lyrics on MusixMatch.

lyricsBody.description: The full lyrics of the track.

explicit.description: Indicates if the lyrics contain explicit content.

language.description: The language in which the lyrics are written.

copyright.description: Copyright information for the lyrics, if available.

get.summary: Get a user icon.

get.summary: Get information about all user icons.

items.description: Information to identify and describe an icon.

get.summary: Search users through their public information.

parameters.description: A query to search for an element with a fuzzy algorithm.

parameters.description: The size of page with which to split results.

parameters.description: The page to index into, starting at 0.

matches.description: An array of near-matches, sorted from most relevant to least.

tags.name: TODO Schema
tags.description: Endpoints whose schema we have yet to do.

tags.name: User CRUD
tags.description: Endpoints of the user's CRUD. (This is the one we implemented.)

tags.name: Melodle
tags.description: Endpoints specifically to play the melodle game.

tags.name: Debug
tags.description: Endpoints only enabled on debug mode. If you see endpoints inside here while in production (so, if you are our client), please notify us. That would be a security vulnerability.

tags.name: Static
tags.description: Endpoints about information that never changes through user interaction.

tags.name: Artists
tags.description: Endpoints about fetching information from artists.

tags.description: Endpoints related to obtaining tracks lyrics.
